
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VNullDataIslandPacket.cpp
          VNullDataIslandPacket.h
          VNullDataIslandPacket__Syms.cpp
          VNullDataIslandPacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS NullDataIslandPacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/NullDataIslandPacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VNullDataIslandPacket STATIC VNullDataIslandPacket.cpp VNullDataIslandPacket__Syms.cpp
    NullDataIslandPacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VNullDataIslandPacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VNullDataIslandPacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VNullDataIslandPacket verilated)
